vps_m2mIntf.h File Reference
VPS Driver API » M2M Interface API

Generic FVID2 Interface for the M2M operations. More...

#include <ti/drv/vps/include/common/bsp_cfgMem.h>

Data Structures

struct  Vps_M2mIntfFrameStats
 M2m runtime status for the m2m processing request. Used to get time at different processing step/point. More...
 
struct  Vps_M2mIntfCreateParams
 M2M create parameter structure to be passed to the driver at the time of mem to mem driver create call. More...
 
struct  Vps_M2mIntfCreateStatus
 Create status for the M2M create call. This should be passed to the create function as a create status argument while creating the driver. More...
 
struct  Vps_M2mIntfStats
 M2m status structure. Used to get different status information. Used as an argument for IOCTL_VPS_M2M_INTF_GET_STATS ioctl. More...
 
struct  Vps_M2mIntfStatsParams
 Structure for timestamp parameters. Passed as an argument to IOCTL_VPS_M2M_INTF_REG_TS_FXN ioctl. More...
 

Macros

#define IOCTL_VPS_M2M_INTF_ABORT   (VPS_M2M_INTF_IOCTL_BASE + 1U)
 Abort m2m driver and dequeue all frames including those that are not processed. More...
 
#define IOCTL_VPS_M2M_INTF_SET_STATS_PARAMS   (VPS_M2M_INTF_IOCTL_BASE + 2U)
 IOCTL to Enable/Disable statistics collection. More...
 
#define IOCTL_VPS_M2M_INTF_GET_STATS   (VPS_M2M_INTF_IOCTL_BASE + 3U)
 Get M2M driver status information like number of requests processed. More...
 
#define IOCTL_VPS_M2M_INTF_RESET_STATS   (VPS_M2M_INTF_IOCTL_BASE + 4U)
 Resets the statistics, essentially sets the number statistics to 0. This ioctl can be called when there are not active or pending request in the driver. Otherwise it returns error. This ioctl cannot be called from ISR context. More...
 
M2M interface max limits or defaults.
#define VPS_M2M_INTF_MAX_HANDLE_PER_INST   (16U)
 Maximum number of handles supported by M2M driver per driver instance. Note: This is a read only macro. Don't modify the value of this macro.
 
#define VPS_M2M_INTF_DEF_QUEUE_LEN_PER_CH
 Default max number of M2M operation request that can be queued per handle. More...
 
#define VPS_M2M_INTF_MAX_CH_PER_HANDLE   (10U)
 Default max number channels that is supported.
 
#define VPS_M2M_INTF_IOCTL_BASE   (VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE + 0x0200U)
 M2M Generic Interface IOCTL base. VPS_M2M_IOCTL_BASE + 0x100U is already used by VPE M2M driver.
